backend/main.mo: Main backend actor providing admin‑protected Meta API config management, phone‑number status checks via HTTP outcalls, user profile storage, and contact/document submission handling.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds an approvedRecipients map with a default admin number while preserving existing metaApiConfig state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two WhatsApp‑related features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes across UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata for SEO and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing all crawlers and referencing the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing key site routes with last‑modified dates, priorities, and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app in a ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing brand info, contact details, and navigation links for company and legal pages.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header component with navigation links, branding, and conditional admin actions using Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/SEO.tsx: Dynamic SEO helper that updates meta tags, canonical links, and structured data on mount.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Centralized brand metadata including name and logo asset configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for contact forms, document uploads, admin checks, and WhatsApp messaging.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the application's color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point configuring React Query, Internet Identity, global styles, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, milestones, company overview, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Provides an admin dashboard with authentication, search, CSV export, and a table of contact form submissions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact info and a form that submits inquiries via a mutation hook with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Shows a disclaimer page with structured sections detailing information use, warranties, and liabilities, plus SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, service features, benefits, navigation links, and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerOnboardingPage: Implements partner onboarding with document requirements, drag-and-drop uploads, type selection, and batch upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page with structured sections detailing data collection and usage.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays main, additional, and agent-support services with features, icons, and images.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfUsePage.tsx: Renders the terms of use page with sections on acceptance, licensing, and user responsibilities.
frontend/src/pages/WhatsAppDashboardPage: Provides an admin-focused WhatsApp messaging dashboard with message viewing, sending, configuration management, and recipient controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores current project configuration and state, including domain setup notes, issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for PB Partners Hub.
